## âœ… Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's coding conventions ([RULES.md](docs/RULES.md))
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally
- [ ] I have tested on multiple browsers (if frontend change)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the task status in `docs/tasks/`

### Security

- [ ] I have checked for potential security vulnerabilities
- [ ] No sensitive data (passwords, keys) is hardcoded
- [ ] Input validation is implemented where needed
